EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name:default=Awesomely}}: VMTurbo Topology Stencils Are Here | for MS Visio & OmniGraffle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
VMTurbo Topology Stencils for MS Visio & OmniGraffle
Download Now: <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=stencils&utm_content=091014> Organize your topology map with stencils that look amazing. {{lead.First Name:default=}}:
VMTurbo's FREE downloadable topology stencils <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=stencils&utm_content=091014> are just our latest way of giving back to the IT community. These HD icons download in both .vssx and .gstencil formats, for use with Microsoft Visio® and OmniGraffle.
Clouds, VDCs, Hosts, Arrays, VDI groups: all in dazzling HD. If you'd like a stencil that we haven't designed, simply visit The Green Circle Community (below) and submit a request!
- Team Turbo Get Free Stencils <http://vmturbo.com/resources/datacenter-stencils/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=stencils&utm_content=091014> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
